live_updates: We continue to await restoration of hydro power to our equipment serving the affected areas.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
45269.summary: Some customers in the West Abbotsford area are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
45269.title: Dec 21 – West Abbotsford | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: This issue has been resolved.  Thank you for your patience.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
45236.summary: Customers in Rossmere and customers in East Saint Paul are experiencing an interruption to their  Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
45236.title: Dec 21 – Winnipeg (Rossmere & East Saint Paul surroundings) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Our teams have resolved the issue. Thank you for your patience!
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
